api_list.name: SSL Checker
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ssl-issuer-and-expiry-date.p.rapidapi.com/api/ssl/rapidapi.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ssl-issuer-and-expiry-date.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ssl-issuer-and-expiry-date.p.rapidapi.com/api/ssl/{domain}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ssl-issuer-and-expiry-date.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
